title: Welcome to Your Justia Insights Newsletter
message: Stay informed with the newsletter designed to bring updates and insights from our team directly to the Justia Connect community.

In this edition of Justia Insights, you can learn about Google Ads for lawyers and register for our upcoming Justia Webinars. Explore the latest news and information in the law and technology industries, including commentary on whether artificial intelligence is coming for lawyers and news about the ABA’s data breach. Plus, check the Justia Ask A Lawyer section to see if you are this month’s Featured Participating Member, catch up with Team Justia as we continue celebrating our company anniversary, and more!
